title: Auto Product Seeding
description: Send products to creators at scale with zero spreadsheet gymnastics. Smart matching ensures the right products reach the right creators.

title: One-Click DMs
description: Reach out to the right creators using smart, prebuilt automations. Personalized outreach that actually converts.

title: Social Listening Suite
description: Discover fans already talking about you and invite them to collaborate. Turn existing brand love into UGC campaigns.

title: Analytics & Reporting
description: Track earned media value, engagement, and conversion — not just likes. Real ROI metrics that matter to your business.

title: Commission & Payouts
description: Set flat or percentage payouts. We handle the rest — taxes included. Automated payments via UPI, PayPal, and bank transfers.

title: Content Moderation
description: UGC posts are auto-checked to match brand guidelines before approval. Maintain brand consistency at scale.
